description: Try our easy to follow Kumato Puttanesca Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tuna salad,Soy free,Wheat free,Salad,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Kumato Puttanesca Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup flatleaf parsley, leaves roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the anchovies then use a fork to mash them to a paste. Add to a small nonstick frying pan with 1 tablespoon of oil. Cook, stirring for 3 minutes over medium heat until dissolved. Add the garlic and chilli, cook for 30 seconds. Transfer to a bowl and cool for 10 minutes. Stir in the remaining oil, vinegar and season with pepper.
Scatter the leaves over a serving platter. Slice the KumatoÂ® tomatoes and arrange on the platter. Top with the onions, capers, olives, parsley and parmesan. Spoon over the dressing, season. Serve.
